name: oneDrone-dr

scripts.start: pm2 start setIP.js && pm2 start od-dr-rc-man.js --name RC-MAN && pm2 start od-dr-rc-relay.js --name RC-RELAY  && pm2 start od-dr-tele-man.js --name TELE-MAN && pm2 start od-dr-tele-relay.js --name TELE-RELAY && pm2 start rc_gpio.py --name RC-GPIO --interpreter python3 && pm2 save

author: Wonseok Jung, Autonomous IoT Research Center, KETI
